title: Part 206 - Uniform Rules For The Court Of Claims
content:
Part 206 - Uniform Rules For The Court Of Claims

State Regulations

§ 206.2 - Terms and parts of court
§ 206.3 - Individual assignment system; structure
§ 206.4 - Court districts; structure

§ 206.5-aa - Filing by electronic means

§ 206.6 - Contents of a claim or a notice of intention to file a claim; action for declaratory judgment
§ 206.7 - Responsive and amended pleadings

§ 206.9 - Motion procedure

§ 206.13 - Calendars
§ 206.14 - Exchange of medical reports in personal injury and wrongful death actions
§ 206.15 - Default; restoration; dismissal
§ 206.16 - Identification of trial counsel
§ 206.17 - Engagement of counsel
§ 206.18 - Entry of judgment
§ 206.19 - Bifurcated trials
§ 206.20 - Sanctions

§ 206.25 - Official forms

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
